About the Company: Arihant Foundations & Housing Ltd caters to building segments such as villas, apartments, IT parks, hotels, shopping malls, multiplexes, developed plots and commercial buildings. The company has a great ability to serve a diverse range of clients from individual home buyers to commercial clients to multi-unit investors.
